game.name: Every Day We Fight
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 인류의 마지막 희망은 타임 루프에 갇힌 저항군 투사들입니다. 실시간 탐험과 턴제 전술 및 로그라이트 전략과 만나, 새로운 능력을 배우고, 새로운 무기를 찾고, 새로운 기술을 개발하는 과정에서 미지의 외계 위협으로부터 살아남아야 합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Caught in a time loop, your band of resistance fighters is humanity’s last hope. Real-time exploration meets turn-based tactics and roguelite strategy as you learn new abilities, seek out new weapons, and develop new techniques to overcome the mysterious alien threat.

reviewHighlights.text: Some cons and pros: +++ Very interesting gameplay, first person view when aiming is amazing. +- Character skill tree could be better but its not bad....
Maaaannnn, I really wanted to like this game. It has so much that I love, nearly perfect XCOM style strategy, cool sci-fi extradimensional-alien-time...
